title: design/template issues with post-setup-check and gallery app
body:
copied from #4231:

>@owncloud/designers
>don't know if it's just me, but the post-setup-check screen looks weird as well:
>i can scroll it down, when scrolling down i see this:
>![screenshot](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1410802/876527/9d3dafec-f8ce-11e2-8573-2d25752f7e9b.png)
>above there's the error message "your webserver is not ready for webdav blahblah".

### expected behaviour
sharp looks

### actual behaviour
bad looks (see screenshot)

### steps to reproduce
0.1. make your webdav not work (in my case my server doesn't resolve the hostname)
0.2. have the gallery app enabled (standard)
1. go to https://testclo.ud/index.php/post-setup-check
2. wait some seconds
3. scroll down

### server configuration
operating system: opensuse 12.3

web server: nginx 1.5.2

database: sqlite

php version: 5.5.0

owncloud version: latest master

### client configuration
browser: chromium 30.0.1575.0 and firefox 22.0

operating system: opensuse 12.3

### logs

#### browser log
js:
```
uncaught typeerror: cannot read property 'offsetwidth' of undefined
```
but that seems unrelated/resulting from this missplacement.


@owncloud/designers
